apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: Classic Game Emulator
apps.versionDescription: Added new N64 support and bug fixes.
apps.localizedDescription: Delta is a powerful and flexible emulator for iOS devices, supporting multiple classic consoles including Game Boy, Game Boy Advance, NES, SNES, N64, and more.

apps.name: LiveContainer
apps.subtitle: Run iOS Apps Without Installing
apps.versionDescription: Minor release fixing symbol offset cache issues and improving window controls.
apps.localizedDescription: LiveContainer is an app launcher that allows you to run iOS apps without actually installing them. It supports unlimited apps, multiple versions, and JIT-less mode for non-jailbroken devices.
